title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 37.2 - Patients in state-operated psychiatric facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 37.2 - Patients in state-operated psychiatric facilities

State Regulations

In responding to absences of patients from State-operated
psychiatric facilities, such facilities shall comply with the requirements of
the Office of Mental Health policy manual rather than this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
37.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
